name: Aman Bhatt
highest_education_college: Bipin Tripathi Kumaon Institute of Technology
about: Experienced iOS Developer with 4.10 years of experience, I have honed my skills in creating high-quality, user-friendly mobile applications. My expertise spans the entire app development lifecycle, from initial concept to deployment on the App Store. I am currently working as a Senior Software Engineer at Webkul, where I lead projects focused on eCommerce, Marketplace, and custom mobile solutions. I specialize in Swift, Xcode, Cocoa Touch, and various iOS frameworks, ensuring robust and scalable app architectures.

experience.description:
• Worked and developed the mobile applications based on the Magento 2, OpenCart, Prestashop and Odoo eCommerce framework which are available on the App Store.
  • Rich experience in creating the eCommerce application for the Marketplace and Hyperlocal modules and Delivery Boy applications.
  • Implemented modules such as Wallet System, Auction System, Biometric login etc.
  • Blog writing on iOS and Flutter technology.
  • Managed Micro teams and mentor them.
  • Worked on client applications and delivered the projects.
  • Lead the development of e-commerce applications with a team of 3+ members.
  • Integrated payment gateways like ApplePay, Stripe, Paypal, Razorpay, etc. ensuring secure and efficient handling of transactions within the app.

During my tenure as an iOS Developer, I have gained extensive experience working on a variety of iOS application platforms, encompassing both offline and online environments. In offline development, I focused on building applications that function seamlessly without continuous internet connectivity, utilizing local data storage, caching mechanisms, and background synchronization processes. This ensured that users could access essential features and data even in low or no network conditions, enhancing the app's reliability and user experience.
